general_advisory: In transplanted rice at the time of final main field preparation, apply 0.8 ton/acre of well decomposed FYM. For high yielding varieties apply 44kg of DAP+33KG OF MOP or 22kg of Urea+ 125 kg SSP+ 33 kg of MOP as basal dose at the time of last puddling, go for application of pre-emergence weedicide like Butachlor 1kg/ha.

advisory: The district has received normal rainfall in the previous month. The direct seeded rice is at 3-4 week stage, The district is going to receive light to medium rainfall in coming five day . Go for Beushaning as enough standing water (7-10cm) will be available. Go for top dressing of 36 kg of urea /acre as top dressing.
